title: Zagreb’s Secrets of Grič Lauded As Tourism ProjectTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Zagreb’s Secrets of Grič Lauded As Tourism Project Published on : Monday, October 5, 2015
Tourism in the Croatian capital of Zagreb is booming. The Secrets of Grič, one of the favourite tours for the citizens of Zagreb and their guests, has received nother important international recognition. In early September, this popular cultural and tourism project was nominated for The Luxury Travel Guide Award 2016, media reported on October 3, 2015. After more than 500,000 registered users from all over the world cast their votes, The Secrets of Grič project team received the news that they have won anaward in the Unique Experience of the Year category.
The nomination process is completely independent, and Luxury Travel Guide collected nominations put forward by tourists and companies, including readers, hotel guests, travel agencies and experts in the tourism industry.
It is a great encouragement for The Secrets of Grič project team, with includes almost 40 performers (from actors and knights to musicians and horsemen), and whose successful sixth season finished in mid-September.
This interesting combination of tourist sightseeing and entertainment has been receiving praise from visitors, media and tourism industry since 2009. For the third consecutive year, The Secrets of Grič have won an excellence award by Trip Advisor, the largest and most influential travel social network in the world, while the prestigious National Geographic included The Secrets of Grič in its selection of the best night tours of the world.
The project is organized by Katapult Promocija, in cooperation with the Zagreb Tourist Board. In 2013, The Secrets of Grič project received a special award by the Croatian National Tourist Board in the category of cultural itineraries, while a year before the project was awarded Croatian Business Tourism award for the best marketing programin Croatian business tourism.
